rotating.mixNo: It is not allowed to mix texture with color
rotating.mixYes: It is allowed to mix texture with color

about.title: 3D Configurators
about.more02: A 3D configurator is an innovative online technology that enables users to interact with 3D product models in real-time. It’s a powerful tool for businesses that allows your customers to customize products to their preferences—changing colors, textures, and other parameters and seeing the results instantly.
about.more03:
Here are several types of 3D configurators:
– Color Configurator: Select and change the color of an object.
– Texture Configurator: Choose and adjust the texture for an object.
– Multi-configurator: Simultaneously modify color and texture for complete personalization.
about.more04: The project is built on the Vue.js framework and utilizes Three.js — one of the most powerful libraries for 3D graphics on the web. This ensures high performance and a user-friendly interface.
